des:
If you have any problems, please contact our customer service: customerservice@monsterilluminessence.com

Before you can connect Alexa with Monster Smart Lighting devices, you need to finish setting up the product in the app first:

1. Download “Monster Smart Lighting” app from App Store or Google Play. 
2. Create or sign into your Monster Smart Lighting account. 
3. Add your device to “Devices” in the Monster Smart Lighting app. 
4. Open the Alexa app, search for “Monster Smart Lighting” skill, and enable it by signing into your Monster Smart Lighting account. 
5. Now you can control your device via Alexa

All Monster Smart Lighting devices are compatible with Alexa!

Once you know the name of your device, you can say the following:

Alexa, turn on/off bedroom light
Alexa, set the bedroom light to blue
Alexa, change the bedroom light to the color red
Alexa, set bedroom light to 25%
Alexa, dim/brighten bedroom light 
Alexa, increase/decrease bedroom light
